snippet.title: Bad North - Available Now on Discord
snippet.description:
Bad North has arrived on PC and is available first on Discord! 
Get It Here:  https://discordapp.com/store/skus/488422292137836574/bad-north

Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island. Everything is at stake: fail, and watch the blood of your subjects stain the ground red.

Get announcements for our games first at: discord.gg/rawfury
